summary: During an ocean dive, Miami gumshoe Tony Rome (Frank Sinatra) finds a woman's body with her feet encased in a concrete block and sets out to solve the murder case.

Lewis|Charlene Mathies|Shirley Parker|B.S. Pully|Chris Robinson|Coz Serapere|Dick Sterling|Bunny Yeager
keywords: go go dancer|motorboat|punched in the face|police car|semiautomatic pistol
title: La mujer de cemento
